com.mindfusion.scheduling.model

Class SerializationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.SerializationContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlSerializationContext

    public class SerializationContext
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains information required to serialize and deserialize Schedule elements to and from a binary stream or XML document.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerializationContext

        public SerializationContext(Schedule schedule)
        Initializes a new instance of the SerializationContext class.

        Generally, you do not have to instantiate from SerializationContext explicitly unless you want to serialize only particular elements and not the entire schedule.

        Parameters:
        schedule - An instance of the Schedule class representing the schedule to associate with.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileVersion

        public int getFileVersion()
        Description copied from class: SerializationContext
        Gets the format revision number of the file being loaded.

        This revision number specifies the format of the schedule binary and XML files, but not of distinct item classes. If using custom item classes, specify their format revision number when registering them with the schedule via the Schedule.registerItemClass(java.lang.Class<? extends com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Item>, java.lang.String, int) method.

        Returns:
        An integer value identifying the schedule file format revision number.

      • getSchedule

        public Schedule getSchedule()
        Description copied from class: SerializationContext
        Gets a reference to the schedule currently being serialized or deserialized.
        Returns:
        An instance of the Schedule class.

      • addSerializationContextListener

        public void addSerializationContextListener(SerializationContextListener listener)
        Description copied from class: SerializationContext
        Adds a SerializationContextListener to the context.
        Parameters:
        listener - The SerializationContextListener to be added.

      • removeSerializationContextListener

        public void removeSerializationContextListener(SerializationContextListener listener)
        Description copied from class: SerializationContext
        Removes the specified SerializationContextListener from the context.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be removed.
